Uses of Class
nl.naturalis.common.path.Path

  • Packages that use Path 
    Package Description
    nl.naturalis.common.path
    Classes related to following a path to the object or resource denoted by it.

    • Uses of Path in nl.naturalis.common.path

      Fields in nl.naturalis.common.path declared as Path 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Path Path.EMPTY_PATH
      The empty path (containing zero path segments).
      Methods in nl.naturalis.common.path that return Path 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Path Path.append​(String path)
      Returns a new Path consisting of the segments of this Path plus the segments of the specified Path.
      Path Path.append​(Path other)
      Returns a new Path consisting of the segments of this Path plus the segments of the specified Path.
      Path Path.getCanonicalPath()
      Returns a new Path containing only the segments of this Path that are not array indices.
      Path Path.parent()
      Return the parent of this Path or null if this is an empty Path.
      Path Path.replace​(int index, String newValue)
      Returns a new Path with the path segment at the specified array index set to the new value.
      Path Path.shift()
      Returns a new Path with all segments of this Path except the first segment.
      Path Path.subpath​(int from)
      Returns a new Path consisting of all segments starting with the segment at the specified array index.
      Path Path.subpath​(int from, int len)
      Returns a new Path consisting of len starting with segment from.
      Methods in nl.naturalis.common.path with parameters of type Path 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Path Path.append​(Path other)
      Returns a new Path consisting of the segments of this Path plus the segments of the specified Path.
      int Path.compareTo​(Path other)
      Implements Comparable.comparaTo.
      Method parameters in nl.naturalis.common.path with type arguments of type Path 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void PathWalker.readValues​(Object host, Map<Path,​Object> output)
      Reads the values of all paths within the provided object and places them in the provided path-to-value map.
      Constructors in nl.naturalis.common.path with parameters of type Path 
      Constructor Description
      Path​(Path other)
      Copy constructor.
      PathWalker​(Path... paths)
      Creates a PathWalker for the specified paths, setting the value for paths that could not be walked all the way to the end to null.
      Constructor parameters in nl.naturalis.common.path with type arguments of type Path 
      Constructor Description
      PathWalker​(List<Path> paths)
      Creates a PathWalker for the specified paths, setting the value for paths that code not be walked all the way to the end to null.
